history.narrative: Law 12-160, the “Whistleblower Reinforcement Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-191, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 5, 1998, and June 2, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 23, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-398 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-160 became effective on October 7, 1998.
